charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Juliana
and Leon chatting cheerfully.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_0200:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Get this!
Leon just let me battle him!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_0300:
And I learned a lot! Paldea Trainers sure
are strong!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_0400: Heh heh... That’s quite the compliment!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_0500:
We also discovered our partner Pokémon
have something in common!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_0700:
Just like how my Terapagos is strongly linked
to the Terastal phenomenon...
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_0800:
Leon’s Eternatus is deeply connected to
Dynamax!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_0900: Both our Pokémon are full of mysteries.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_1000:
Terapagos and I met in the deepest part of
Area Zero.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_1100:
An Area Zero explorer from long ago left
behind records mentioning it.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_1300:
But they didn’t say anything specific. So other
than his seemingly deep connection to
Terastallization, Terapagos is an enigma.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_1400:
I’ve been hoping to learn something by
becoming better friends with him, but...
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_1500:
Hey, I’m sure you will! He’s your partner
Pokémon, after all, and you understand
each other well!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_1600:
I’m also hoping to learn more about
Eternatus!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_1800: I’m really fond of Terapagos, you know.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_0401_2000:
Yeah! Terapagos has already given me some
great memories!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_0402_2200: Well, the thing about Terapagos is...
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_2300:
I was only able to catch him with the help of
Kieran and Carmine, who came to
investigate and battle him with me.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_2400: For me, that memory is precious!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_2500:
I know what you mean. These Pokémon may
be mysterious and Legendary, but that alone
isn’t what makes them special.
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_2600:
No matter the Pokémon, as you spend time
with it...
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_2700:
you’ll create special memories together—
ones you’ll share forever!
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_2800:
Yup! That’s why, just like with any other
Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0287_40_svgirl/2301_1201_2900:
I know I can become good friends with
Terapagos, too!
